message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,500,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $1,500,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950,000, but I can go a bit lower if you're willing to negotiate further.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While $900,000 is a respectable figure, the true value of this product is significantly higher.  I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This is a very competitive offer considering the long-term benefits this product will bring.

I understand the value of the product, but $1,300,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,150,000, but I'd like to see some more flexibility from you. Can you consider $1,100,000?
